mods.abstract: Contains two medical treatises and a collection of ten extracts from poets and medical authors.Hippocrates (أبقراط), al-Fuṣūl(الفصول) (ff 1v-32r);Ibn Jazlah (ابن جزلة), Minhāj al-bayān(منهاج البيان) (ff 21v-62r);Ten extracts on medical topics in verse and prose (ff 62r-64v).The title page (f. 1r) lists the contents as Fuṣūl Abuqrāṭ(فصول أبقراط) and Fuṣūlal-sittah(فصول الستة).The date of the manuscript is found in the colophon of maqālah 1 of the Minhāj al-Bayān(f. 32r, lines 8-9):يوم الأربعاء الثالث من رمضان سنة تسعين وستمائة الهجرية ('Thursday 3 Ramaḍān 690 AH'/Thursday 30 August AD 1291).
